To start out these are the packages we need:
````{r}
install.packages("adegenet", dep=TRUE)
install.packages("phangorn", dep=TRUE)
```
Then lets load the packages using:
```{r}
library(stats)
library(ade4)
library(ape)
library(adegenet)
library(phangorn)
```
